nodes.text: A royal chief's fortress was located on the Outer Rim planet Lah'mu during the Republic Era. At some point during his time as a Jedi Padawan, Obi-Wan Kenobi visited the fortress. During the mission to Pijal around 40 BBY, Kenobi contemplated the many royal palaces he had visited, and considered the fortress simple in comparison to the queen's palace on the Core Worlds planet Alderaan.
The chief's fortress was first mentioned in Master & Apprentice, a 2019 novel by Claudia Gray.
